title: Item ids varying from commerce/listings ids

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: The ids should be the same between v2/items and v2/commerce/listings. Which one(s) in particular look incorrect?

comments.author: kurzic protector.9327
comments.body: I have recently discovered that the ids are not the same and that the commerce/listings do not return any names. Is there a master list of ids that include names which correctly correspond to the trading post?
